channel.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
channel.description:
I use Whonix in Virtualbox, in MS windows, (planing to move to linux)
Would it interfere with Tor browser that I still have installed in windows, if I used them at once on the same machine?
Using in the same time whonix in VB and TB in Win10 on the same machine.
Would it make some conflict with ports, or some problem?

item.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
item.dc:creator: anon556
item.description:
Port is the only thing I change in settings, a s soon I reverse back google is opening normaly, sometimes with captcha sometimes without.

Read full topic
item.source: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?

item.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Using another port for another instance of TB is unrelated to being blocked by Google.

item.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
item.dc:creator: tgsfnmux
item.description:
Google is not Tor friendly.

try:
https://search.disconnect.me/

DuckDuckGo

The Internet privacy company that empowers you to seamlessly take control of your personal information online, without any tradeoffs.

item.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
item.dc:creator: anon556
item.description:
Thanks.

Once, I tried to use another port for another instance of TB but when I try google it is always blocked,
usually I solve captha on google, but when it is with different port google is always blocked “couldnt accept your request”. dont know why.

Read full topic
item.source: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?

item.title: Using Tor browser in Windows, and Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

No, though please keep this in mind as it applies here as well: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#More_than_one_Tor_Browser_in_Whonix

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
